#summary How to build executable from sources

= Introduction =

Please read [HowToBuildPBL] page, to check the requirements and to read how to organize project workspace.

= How to build executable =

To do that, you can use the batch `\AseisqlProject\svn\build\build_exe.cmd`

This batch uses [http://dm.char.com.ua/pb/pborca.htm pborca tool] to build libraries and executable.

You can check the `build_exe.orc` file to see the `orca` commands to be executed.

= Result =
There will be created `\AseisqlProject\exe` directory,  
where all the deploy files will be placed.
